material.mattext: If there is no personal include area template created for a site template then:
include areas can not be created for pages where this template is applied
if this template is applied than include areas will not be displayed
include areas for pages where this template is applied can be created with use of templates stored in the folder /bitrix/templates/.default/page_templates/
include areas for pages where this template is applied can be created with use of templates stored in the folder /bitrix/templates/<site_template_ID>/
